speech:
Kenya Mpya

•Tall plant (about 1 m) with good ground cover
•Flowers are white
•Tubers have Cream white skin color with pink 
shallow eyes
•Optimal production altitude: 1,400 – 3,000 m
•Resistant to Late Blight
•Early tuberization: large size, oval/round 
tubers
•Good storability 
•Short dormancy
•Maturity Period: 3 – 3.5 month
•Yield: 14,000 – 18,000kg per acre
•Use: boiling, roasting, mashing, chips
